      • addTask

        @RequestMapping(value="/addTask",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json;charset=utf-8",
                consumes="application/json;charset=utf-8")
public java.lang.String addTask(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                         com.olo.ding.entity.TaskDistributeEntity distributeEntity)
        任务创建 请求url：POST http://crmmobile1.olo-home.com:8084/taskDistribute/addTask 参数：{"sfwzq":"0","rwksrq":"2020-09-01","rwkssj":"15:00:00","rwjsrq":"2020-10-01","rwjssj":"16:00:00","rwmc":"测试任务","cjr":"27089","zxr":"27089","jdr":"27089","xzr":"27089","rwfj":"[www.baidu.com]","cfzq":"1","userId":"27089"}
        参数:
        sfwzq：是否为周期任务，0：是，1，否; - rwksrq：任务开始日期; rwkssj：任务开始时间; rwjsrq：任务结束日期; rwjssj：任务结束时间; rwmc：任务名称; cjr：创建人; zxr：执行人; jdr：监督人; xzr：协作人; rwfj：任务附件; cfzq：重复周期 0按天，1按周，2按月，3按季度; userId：userId;
        返回:
